titles.title: Philippine Veterans Currency Act of 1994

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to eliminate the requirement that veterans of the Philippine Commonwealth Army and the dependents and survivors of such veterans be paid certain benefits in Philippine pesos.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9736-9737)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

bill.summary: 7/26/1994--Introduced. Philippine Veterans Currency Act of 1994 - Eliminates the requirement that veterans of the Philippine Commonwealth Army and their survivors and dependents be paid veterans' benefits (including disability compensation and survivors' and dependents' educational assistance) in Philippine pesos.
